table | seriesByIndex(0) | pick(tableAltRowBackgroundColorsByTheme)"},"columnFormat":{"Disk Used MB":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("Disk Used MB") | seriesByName("Raw Size MB") | formatByType(Raw_Size_MBColumnFormatEditorConfig)"}}},"title":"Index Retention and Where is my data?"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_8eWzFOXQ":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats values(sourcetype) as sourcetype WHERE index=* by index","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time.earliest$","latest":"$global_time.latest$"}},"name":"Index to Sourcetype"},"ds_KJ1hLURW":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats c WHERE index=* by index"},"name":"list_indexes"},"ds_ikD8KaVd":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| metasearch index=$index$ | timechart dc(host) by index"},"name":"host_dc"},"ds_K5kCKxOF_ds_9rvngVrS_ds_ikD8KaVd":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=$index$ | timechart dc(host) by sourcetype"},"name":"sourcetype_DC"},"ds_F4XEAV9v":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| rest splunk_server=* /services/data/indexes 
 | join title type=outer [
 | rest splunk_server=linuxmint /services/data/indexes-extended 
 | eval cold_bucket_size = if(isnotnull('bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_size'), 'bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_size', 'bucket_dirs.cold.size')
 | fields title, cold_bucket_size, total_size, total_bucket_count]
| `dmc_exclude_indexes`
| fields title datatype maxTotalDataSizeMB currentDBSizeMB frozenTimePeriodInSecs minTime coldPath.maxDataSizeMB homePath.maxDataSizeMB, homePath, coldPath, cold_bucket_size, total_size, total_bucket_count, totalEventCount
| eval currentDBSizeGB = if(isnotnull(currentDBSizeMB), round(currentDBSizeMB / 1024, 2), 0)
| eval maxTotalDataSizeGB = if((maxTotalDataSizeMB == 0) OR isnull(maxTotalDataSizeMB), "unlimited", round(maxTotalDataSizeMB / 1024, 2))
| eval disk_usage_gb = currentDBSizeGB." / ".maxTotalDataSizeGB
| eval currentTimePeriodDay = round((now() - strptime(minTime,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S%z")) / 86400, 0)
| eval currentTimePeriodDay = if(isnull(currentTimePeriodDay), 0, currentTimePeriodDay)
| eval frozenTimePeriodDay = round(frozenTimePeriodInSecs / 86400, 0)
| eval frozenTimePeriodDay = if(isnull(frozenTimePeriodDay) OR frozenTimePeriodDay == 0, "unlimited", frozenTimePeriodDay)
| eval freeze_period_viz = currentTimePeriodDay." / ".frozenTimePeriodDay
| eval total_bucket_count = if(isnotnull(total_bucket_count), total_bucket_count, 0)
| eval totalEventCount = if(isnotnull(totalEventCount), totalEventCount, 0)
| eval home_bucket_size_gb = round((total_size - if(isnull(cold_bucket_size), 0, cold_bucket_size)) / 1024, 2)
| eval home_bucket_size_gb = if(isnull(home_bucket_size_gb), 0, home_bucket_size_gb)
| eval home_bucket_capacity_gb = if(isnull('homePath.maxDataSizeMB') OR 'homePath.maxDataSizeMB' = 0, "unlimited", round('homePath.maxDataSizeMB' / 1024, 2))
| eval home_bucket_usage_gb = home_bucket_size_gb." / ".home_bucket_capacity_gb
| eval cold_bucket_size_gb = if(isnull(cold_bucket_size), 0, round(cold_bucket_size / 1024, 2))
| eval cold_bucket_capacity_gb = if(isnull('coldPath.maxDataSizeMB') OR 'coldPath.maxDataSizeMB' = 0, "unlimited", round('coldPath.maxDataSizeMB' / 1024, 2))
| eval cold_bucket_usage_gb = cold_bucket_size_gb." / ".cold_bucket_capacity_gb

| fields title currentDBSizeGB
"},"name":"Index Size Total Indexes"},"ds_15Dnjcnp":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| rest splunk_server=* /services/data/indexes 
 | join title type=outer [
 | rest splunk_server=linuxmint /services/data/indexes-extended 
 | eval cold_bucket_size = if(isnotnull('bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_size'), 'bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_size', 'bucket_dirs.cold.size')
 | fields title, cold_bucket_size, total_size, total_bucket_count]

| fields title datatype maxTotalDataSizeMB currentDBSizeMB frozenTimePeriodInSecs minTime coldPath.maxDataSizeMB homePath.maxDataSizeMB, homePath, coldPath, cold_bucket_size, total_size, total_bucket_count, totalEventCount
| eval currentDBSizeGB = if(isnotnull(currentDBSizeMB), round(currentDBSizeMB / 1024, 2), 0)
| eval maxTotalDataSizeGB = if((maxTotalDataSizeMB == 0) OR isnull(maxTotalDataSizeMB), "unlimited", round(maxTotalDataSizeMB / 1024, 2))
| eval disk_usage_gb = currentDBSizeGB." / ".maxTotalDataSizeGB
| eval currentTimePeriodDay = round((now() - strptime(minTime,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S%z")) / 86400, 0)
| eval currentTimePeriodDay = if(isnull(currentTimePeriodDay), 0, currentTimePeriodDay)
| eval frozenTimePeriodDay = round(frozenTimePeriodInSecs / 86400, 0)
| eval frozenTimePeriodDay = if(isnull(frozenTimePeriodDay) OR frozenTimePeriodDay == 0, "unlimited", frozenTimePeriodDay)
| eval freeze_period_viz = currentTimePeriodDay." / ".frozenTimePeriodDay
| eval total_bucket_count = if(isnotnull(total_bucket_count), total_bucket_count, 0)
| eval totalEventCount = if(isnotnull(totalEventCount), totalEventCount, 0)
| eval home_bucket_size_gb = round((total_size - if(isnull(cold_bucket_size), 0, cold_bucket_size)) / 1024, 2)
| eval home_bucket_size_gb = if(isnull(home_bucket_size_gb), 0, home_bucket_size_gb)
| eval home_bucket_capacity_gb = if(isnull('homePath.maxDataSizeMB') OR 'homePath.maxDataSizeMB' = 0, "unlimited", round('homePath.maxDataSizeMB' / 1024, 2))
| eval home_bucket_usage_gb = home_bucket_size_gb." / ".home_bucket_capacity_gb
| eval cold_bucket_size_gb = if(isnull(cold_bucket_size), 0, round(cold_bucket_size / 1024, 2))
| eval cold_bucket_capacity_gb = if(isnull('coldPath.maxDataSizeMB') OR 'coldPath.maxDataSizeMB' = 0, "unlimited", round('coldPath.maxDataSizeMB' / 1024, 2))
| eval cold_bucket_usage_gb = cold_bucket_size_gb." / ".cold_bucket_capacity_gb
 | where (title == "$index$") 
| fields currentDBSizeGB","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"index size"},"ds_U9mOdP2E":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| rest splunk_server=* /services/data/indexes
 | join type=outer title [
 | rest splunk_server=* /services/data/indexes-extended
 ]
| search title=$index$
| eval retentionInDays=frozenTimePeriodInSecs/86400
| table title retentionInDays"},"name":"index_retention"},"ds_bIMDdZHy":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| metasearch index=$index$ | stats earliest(_time) as earliest_event
| convert ctime(earliest_event) AS earliest_event timeformat="%x"","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"index_earliest event"},"ds_RXC5MAoi":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| metasearch index=$index$ | stats latest(_time) as time | eval secondsAgo=now() - time | fieldformat secondsAgo = tostring(secondsAgo,"duration") | fields secondsAgo"},"name":"index_latest event"},"ds_ODNpzMbK":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats c WHERE index=* by index sourcetype | sort -c ","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time.earliest$","latest":"$global_time.latest$"}},"name":"Index_to sourcetype"},"ds_Rg2F9VHl":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_KJ1hLURW","query":"| search index=$index$"},"name":"Index_Selected Name"},"ds_tnJM8bun":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| dbinspect index=* 
| eval state=if(state=="hot" OR state=="warm","hot/warm",state)
| stats sum(rawSize) as rawSizeTotal sum(sizeOnDiskMB) as diskused by splunk_server index state
| eval "Raw Size MB"=round(rawSizeTotal/1024/1024,3) | eval "Disk Used MB"=round(diskused,3)
| fields - rawSizeTotal diskused splunk_server
| join [ 
| rest splunk_server=* /services/data/indexes
 | join type=outer title [
 | rest splunk_server=* /services/data/indexes-extended
 ]
| search title=* NOT title=_*

| eval retentionInDays=frozenTimePeriodInSecs/86400
| table title retentionInDays
| rename title AS index ]
| sort - "Disk Used MB" 
| fields - _timediff","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time.earliest$","latest":"$global_time.latest$"}},"name":"Index and Size"},"ds_IUUTgz3y_ds_K5kCKxOF_ds_9rvngVrS_ds_ikD8KaVd":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=_internal source="/opt/splunk/var/log/splunk/metrics.log" group=per_index_thruput series=$index$
| rename series as index
| timechart sum(kbps) as "KbPerSecond" sum(eps) as "Events Per Second"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time.earliest$","latest":"$global_time.latest$"}},"name":"Index_datapersecond"},"ds_FuhJ4lAc":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_IUUTgz3y_ds_K5kCKxOF_ds_9rvngVrS_ds_ikD8KaVd","query":"| stats avg(KbPerSecond)","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"Index Events per second Sub"},"ds_lo5Bi1lo_ds_FuhJ4lAc":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_IUUTgz3y_ds_K5kCKxOF_ds_9rvngVrS_ds_ikD8KaVd","query":"| stats avg("Events Per Second")","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"Index Events per second Sub copy 1"},"ds_jsFlEQG1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| datamodel
| rex field=_raw "\"modelName\"\s*\:\s*\"(?<modelName>[^\"]+)\""
| search NOT modelName IN (Splunk_CIM_Validation)
| fields modelName
| table modelName
| map maxsearches=40 search="tstats summariesonly=true count from datamodel=$$modelName$$ by sourcetype | eval modelName=\"$$modelName$$\""
| append [| search index=_internal source=*license_usage.log type="Usage" pool=*
 | eval sourcetype = st
 | stats count by sourcetype
 | eval modelName="removeit", count=0
 | fields sourcetype modelName count]
| xyseries sourcetype modelName count | fillnull value="Not Present"
| fields - removeit","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time.earliest$","latest":"$global_time.latest$"}},"name":"Data Models Source-Index Feeds"},"ds_qpnqfOIu_ds_jsFlEQG1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| datamodel
| rex field=_raw "\"modelName\"\s*\:\s*\"(?<modelName>[^\"]+)\""
| search NOT modelName IN (Splunk_CIM_Validation)
| fields modelName
| table modelName
| map maxsearches=40 search="tstats summariesonly=true count from datamodel=$modelName$ by sourcetype | eval modelName=\"$modelName$\""
| append [| search index=_internal source=*license_usage.log type="Usage" pool=*
 | eval sourcetype = st
 | stats count by sourcetype
 | eval modelName="removeit", count=0
 | fields sourcetype modelName count]
| xyseries sourcetype modelName count | fillnull value="Not Present"
| fields - removeit","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time.earliest$","latest":"$global_time.latest$"}},"name":"Data Models Source-Index Feeds copy 1"},"ds_QHaR78Z5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats values(sourcetype) as sourcetype WHERE index=* by index
| mvexpand sourcetype
| join sourcetype [
| datamodel
| rex field=_raw "\"modelName\"\s*\:\s*\"(?<modelName>[^\"]+)\""
| search NOT modelName IN (Splunk_CIM_Validation)
| fields modelName
| table modelName
| map maxsearches=60 search="tstats summariesonly=true count from datamodel=$$modelName$$ by sourcetype | eval modelName=\"$$modelName$$\"" ] | fields modelName index sourcetype
| mvcombine sourcetype
| rename modelName as "Data Model"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time.earliest$","latest":"$global_time.latest$"},"enableSmartSources":true},"name":"Datamodels - Index Sourcetype Mapping"},"ds_vjKugSTP":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_BM9NwP46","query":"| tstats values(sourcetype) as sourcetype WHERE index=* by index
| mvexpand sourcetype
| join sourcetype [
| datamodel
| rex field=_raw "\"modelName\"\s*\:\s*\"(?<modelName>[^\"]+)\""
| search NOT modelName IN (Splunk_CIM_Validation)
| fields modelName
| table modelName
| map maxsearches=60 search="tstats summariesonly=true count from datamodel=$modelName$ by sourcetype | eval modelName=\"$modelName$\"" ] | fields modelName index sourcetype
| mvcombine sourcetype"},"name":"Search_2"},"ds_Z4xS6LRa_ds_QHaR78Z5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats values(sourcetype) as sourcetype WHERE index=* by index
| mvexpand sourcetype
| join sourcetype [
| datamodel
| rex field=_raw "\"modelName\"\s*\:\s*\"(?<modelName>[^\"]+)\""
| search NOT modelName IN (Splunk_CIM_Validation)
| fields modelName
| table modelName
| map maxsearches=60 search="tstats summariesonly=true count from datamodel=$$modelName$$ by sourcetype | eval modelName=\"$$modelName$$\"" ] | fields modelName index sourcetype

| rename modelName as "Data Model"

| fields - _*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time.earliest$","latest":"$global_time.latest$"},"enableSmartSources":true},"name":"Datamodels - Index Sourcetype Mapping copy 2"},"ds_vVlycsgT":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_ODNpzMbK","query":"| fields - c"},"name":"Index_to sourcetype no count"},"ds_CMUaKF6Z":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=$index$ | timechart dc(sourcetype) "},"name":"Distinct Sourcetypes"},"ds_s2dP7mpc":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_ODNpzMbK","query":"| head 20"},"name":"Search_1"},"ds_dpsRYuH1":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_ODNpzMbK","query":"| stats dc(index)"},"name":"Search_3"},"ds_XzDwiJ9D_ds_dpsRYuH1":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_ODNpzMbK","query":"| stats c(index)"},"name":"Search_3 copy 1"},"ds_g9dD7j1s":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_ODNpzMbK","query":"| stats dc(sourcetype)"},"name":"Count Sourcetype"},"ds_gmTPocSf_ds_g9dD7j1s":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_ODNpzMbK","query":"| stats dc(sourcetype)"},"name":"Count Sourcetype copy 1"},"ds_FAJDxEkY":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_tnJM8bun","query":"
|stats sum("Disk Used MB") as sizegb
| eval sizegb=round(exact(sizegb/1024),2)"},"name":"Disk Used"},"ds_P1eSGoak_ds_FAJDxEkY":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_tnJM8bun","query":"
|stats sum("Raw Size MB") as sizegb
| eval sizegb=round(exact(sizegb/1024),2)"},"name":"Disk Used copy 1"},"ds_eRMJqAeC_ds_K5kCKxOF_ds_9rvngVrS_ds_ikD8KaVd":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=_internal source=*license_usage.log* idx=$index$ | timechart span=5m sum(eval(((b/1024)/1024)/1024)) AS gb by st limit=20 usenull=f","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"Index Data Ingestion"},"ds_QGa0d4bw":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| multisearch 

[ search index="_internal" host=* apiEndTime litsearch NOT pretypeahead source="/opt/splunk/var/log/splunk/remote_searches.log*" | rex "apiStartTime='(?<search_et>.*?)'" | convert mktime(search_et) AS search_et timeformat="%a %B %d %H:%M:%S %Y" | fillnull search_et value=0 | eval lookback=_time-search_et | rex max_match=100 "index(?:\s=\s|=\s|\s=|=)(?<explict_index>.*?)(?:\s|$$|\)|\'|\,)" | rex "search_id=.*?splunkcloud.com_(?<search_id>.*?)," | fields lookback search_id explict_index ] 
[search index="_audit" host=* TERM(info=completed) NOT typeahead | rex "search_id='(?<search_id>.*?)'" | eval search_et=if(search_et="N/A",0,search_et) | rex "', search='(?<thesearch>.*)"| rex max_match=100 field=thesearch "index(?:\s=\s|=\s|\s=|=)(?<explict_index>.*?)(?:\s|$$|\)|\'|\,)" | eval lookback=_time-search_et | fields search_id lookback explict_index ]


| stats dc(search_id) AS id max(lookback) as oldest_event_searched by explict_index 
| eval explict_index=lower(explict_index) 
| rex mode=sed field=explict_index "s/(?:^\"|\"$$|\)|\|)//g" 
| stats sum(id) AS job_count max(oldest_event_searched) as oldest_event_searched by explict_index 
| regex explict_index!="(?:\?|\>|\<|\?|\.|\$$|\^|\%|\,|\`|\s|\+|\\\|\"|\'|^\*$$|\(|\)|\=)" | join type=inner explict_index [| eventcount summarize=false index=* index=_* | dedup index | rename index AS explict_index | fields explict_index]
| append 
 [| stats count 
 | eval explict_index="*" 
 | eval job_count="catchall" 
 | fields - count] 
| map maxsearches=600 search="| eventcount summarize=false index=* index=_* | dedup index | rename index AS idx | fields idx | search idx=\"$$explict_index$$\" | eval jobs=\"$$job_count$$\" | eval oldest_event_searched=\"$$oldest_event_searched$$\" " 
| join type=left idx 
 [ search earliest=-3d@d latest=@d index=_internal source=*license* host=* TERM(idx=) 
 | bucket span=1d _time 
 | stats sum(eval((b/1024)/1024)) AS mb by idx _time 
 | stats max(mb) AS mb by idx 
 | eval mb=round(mb,4) ] 
| dedup idx jobs 

| stats sum(jobs) AS search_jobs max(mb) AS daily_mb max(oldest_event_searched) as oldest_event_searched by idx 
| eval _time=NOW()-oldest_event_searched
| fillnull search_jobs value="none_found" 
| eval _time=if(isnull(_time),0,_time)
| fillnull daily_mb value="0"
| reltime 
| rename reltime AS display_searched_time
| eval _time=if(search_jobs="none_found",NULL(),_time)
| eval display_earliest_searched_time=if(search_jobs="none_found",NULL(),display_searched_time) 
| convert ctime(_time) AS earliest_searched_time timeformat="%F"
| eval earliest_searched_time=if(earliest_searched_time="1970-01-01","All Time", earliest_searched_time)
| eval display_earliest_searched_time=if(earliest_searched_time="All Time", "All Time",display_earliest_searched_time)
| table idx search_jobs daily_mb earliest_searched_time display_earliest_searched_time
| join type=left idx [search earliest=-1d index=summary source="splunk-storage-detail" | stats max(retentionDays) AS active_searchable_retention_days by idxName | eval active_searchable_retention_days=round(active_searchable_retention_days,0) | rename idxName AS idx] | sort 0 - daily_mb
","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time.earliest$","latest":"$global_time.latest$"}},"name":"Last Time Index Searched"},"ds_MddzAFn8_ds_15Dnjcnp":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| rest splunk_server=* /services/data/indexes 
 | join title type=outer [
 | rest splunk_server=linuxmint /services/data/indexes-extended 
 | eval cold_bucket_size = if(isnotnull('bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_size'), 'bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_size', 'bucket_dirs.cold.size')
 | fields title, cold_bucket_size, total_size, total_bucket_count]

| fields title datatype maxTotalDataSizeMB currentDBSizeMB frozenTimePeriodInSecs minTime coldPath.maxDataSizeMB homePath.maxDataSizeMB, homePath, coldPath, cold_bucket_size, total_size, total_bucket_count, totalEventCount
| eval currentDBSizeGB = if(isnotnull(currentDBSizeMB), round(currentDBSizeMB / 1024, 2), 0)
| eval maxTotalDataSizeGB = if((maxTotalDataSizeMB == 0) OR isnull(maxTotalDataSizeMB), "unlimited", round(maxTotalDataSizeMB / 1024, 2))
| eval disk_usage_gb = currentDBSizeGB." / ".maxTotalDataSizeGB
| eval currentTimePeriodDay = round((now() - strptime(minTime,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S%z")) / 86400, 0)
| eval currentTimePeriodDay = if(isnull(currentTimePeriodDay), 0, currentTimePeriodDay)
| eval frozenTimePeriodDay = round(frozenTimePeriodInSecs / 86400, 0)
| eval frozenTimePeriodDay = if(isnull(frozenTimePeriodDay) OR frozenTimePeriodDay == 0, "unlimited", frozenTimePeriodDay)
| eval freeze_period_viz = currentTimePeriodDay." / ".frozenTimePeriodDay
| eval total_bucket_count = if(isnotnull(total_bucket_count), total_bucket_count, 0)
| eval totalEventCount = if(isnotnull(totalEventCount), totalEventCount, 0)
| eval home_bucket_size_gb = round((total_size - if(isnull(cold_bucket_size), 0, cold_bucket_size)) / 1024, 2)
| eval home_bucket_size_gb = if(isnull(home_bucket_size_gb), 0, home_bucket_size_gb)
| eval home_bucket_capacity_gb = if(isnull('homePath.maxDataSizeMB') OR 'homePath.maxDataSizeMB' = 0, "unlimited", round('homePath.maxDataSizeMB' / 1024, 2))
| eval home_bucket_usage_gb = home_bucket_size_gb." / ".home_bucket_capacity_gb
| eval cold_bucket_size_gb = if(isnull(cold_bucket_size), 0, round(cold_bucket_size / 1024, 2))
| eval cold_bucket_capacity_gb = if(isnull('coldPath.maxDataSizeMB') OR 'coldPath.maxDataSizeMB' = 0, "unlimited", round('coldPath.maxDataSizeMB' / 1024, 2))
| eval cold_bucket_usage_gb = cold_bucket_size_gb." / ".cold_bucket_capacity_gb
 | where (title == "$index$") 
| fields currentDBSizeGB","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"index size copy 1"},"ds_lfY2wYdU":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_QGa0d4bw","query":"| search idx=$index$ 
| fields display_earliest_searched_time"},"name":"Last time index searched Explict"},"ds_tp3IZk6R_ds_lfY2wYdU":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_QGa0d4bw","query":"| search idx=$index$ 
| fields search_jobs"},"name":"Last time index searched Explict copy 1"},"ds_FCSQyjcy_ds_tp3IZk6R_ds_lfY2wYdU":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_QGa0d4bw","query":"| search idx=$index$
